Define Documentation

#define mos_tlist_add (  list,
item   ) 
 

Value:

do {            \
      if((list)->head == NULL) {                \
         (list)->head = item;                   \
         (list)->tail = item;                   \
         (item)->next = NULL;                   \
      } else {                                  \
         (list)->tail->next = item;             \
         (list)->tail = item;                   \
         (item)->next = NULL;                   \
      }                                         \
   } while(0)
Adds a new thread to end of thread list.

Parameters:
list Thread list to add to
item Thread to add to list

Definition at line 42 of file tlist.h.

#define mos_tlist_adjustst (  list,
atime   ) 
 

Value:

do {    \
      thread_t *adjust_front = (list)->head;    \
      while(adjust_front) {                     \
         if(atime > adjust_front->st) {         \
            atime -= adjust_front->st;          \
            adjust_front->st = 0;               \
            adjust_front = adjust_front->next;  \
         } else {                               \
            adjust_front->st -= atime;          \
            break;                              \
         }                                      \
      }                                         \
   } while(0)
Adjusts the sleepQ with elapsed time.
